g.text: • MSB of Gray = MSB of Binary
• Each Gray bit = XOR of adjacent
Binary to Gray: Each bit (except MSB) is XOR of adjacent binary bits. Used in analog-to-digital converters.
Gray to Binary: Sequential XOR operations. Each binary bit depends on previous binary bit and current Gray bit.
• Only one bit changes at a time

svg.text: Code converters enable seamless translation between different digital representations, essential for system interfacing.
